name: Raspberry Jam Thumbprint Cookies
description: Swapped at the 2012 SE cookie swap by Sarah Bray.
recipeIngredient: Jam and chopped pecans for topping

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all ingredients together. The dough should be dry and crumbly. Form into tight balls in palm and place on baking sheet. Press down onto each ball with thumb, gently, then add a scoop of jam and top with chopped pecans. Bake at 350°F for 10 minutes until golden brown.
